description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nMaster of Ghouls:
Your {RACE_Ghoul}s deal additional damage with attacks and spells equal to 15% of their {STAT_speed} for each {RACE_Ghoul} fighting on your side. This trait does not stack.
name: Sigil of the Ghoul
